plot: A young wife tries to protect her sister-in-law from a blackmailer from her own sordid past. She soon finds herself charged with his murder.
title: Locked Doors
plot_es: A young wife tries to protect her sister-in-law from a blackmailer from her own sordid past. She soon finds herself charged with his murder.
plot_en: A young wife tries to protect her sister-in-law from a blackmailer from her own sordid past. She soon finds herself charged with his murder.
